name: ignition-ghost-automation
description: AI-powered blog automation for Ignition Studio with SEO optimization

scripts.generate: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); gen.generateAndCreateBlog().then(r => console.log('Done!', r.post.title)).catch(e => console.error(e.message));"
scripts.generate:scheduled: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); const date = gen.scheduler.getNextPublishDate(); gen.generateAndCreateBlog(null, null, null, date).then(r => console.log('Scheduled!', r.post.title)).catch(e => console.error(e.message));"
scripts.generate:batch: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); gen.generateBatch(3).then(r => console.log('Batch complete!')).catch(e => console.error(e.message));"
scripts.generate:batch-scheduled: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); gen.generateBatch(3, true).then(r => console.log('Scheduled batch complete!')).catch(e => console.error(e.message));"
scripts.preview-schedule: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); gen.previewSchedule(7);"
scripts.stats: node -e "const BlogGenerator = require('./src/automation/blogGenerator'); const gen = new BlogGenerator(); gen.getTopicStats();"
scripts.clear-history: node -e "const TopicHistory = require('./src/utils/topicHistory'); const hist = new TopicHistory(); hist.clearHistory();"
scripts.test-image: node -e "const ImageGenerator = require('./src/services/imageGenerator'); const gen = new ImageGenerator(); gen.testConnection();"
scripts.test-ai: node -e "const AIContent = require('./src/services/aiContent'); const ai = new AIContent(); ai.testConnection();"
scripts.test-ghost: node -e "const Ghost = require('./src/services/ghostAPI'); const g = new Ghost(); g.testConnection();"

author: Ignition Studio
